summary: A disenchantable summon wolf spirit ring.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a ring that summons a spirit wolf upon equip.
There will be an unfamiliar person in Jorrvaskr that is currently sad. Help him to find the ring.

The ring can be disenchanted to put \'wolf souls\' in other items. Combined with my [URL=file.php?id=18203]Soul Pool Perk[/URL] mod, you could have a small wolf spirit army just by your equipment.

I would recommend hotkeying it so when the wolf dies you can quickly unequip, equip it to re-summon it.

This is my first attempt at quest making and voice acting for Skyrim, so please be thoughtful.
(I do apologise for the poor sound quality, I\'m using the PSEye as my mic. I will do my best to improve it when possible.)

[URL=file.php?id=18864]French Translation[/URL] for Version 1.
author: Everlive
